mapper.select: SELECT id, password, name, address, regdate AS regDate, phone, user_number AS userNumber FROM users WHERE id = #{id} AND password = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(id, password, name, address, phone, regdate, indate) VALUE(#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{regDate}, #{inDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{name}, address = #{address}, nick_name = #{nickName}, regdate = #{regDate}, phone = #{phone} WHERE user_number = #{userNumber}
